video.title: SciGirls
video.synopsis: Follow a group of tween girls as they tackle science and engineering projects such as creating a turtle habitat or designing an electronic dress.

episodes.synopsis: Annie and friends use research, ecology knowledge and communication skills to make a wetland habitat more livable for snapping turtles.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: If they want to bring a huge pig puppet to life for the May Day parade, Annie and her pals need to focus on teamwork and technology.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Izzie, Serena and Ceci explore the personalities and behavior of bottlenose dolphins at the Dolphins Plus Research Center in Florida.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Making use of math and analysis skills at an archaeology site, Izzie and friends uncover the mystery of thousand-year-old American Indian artifacts.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: If Izzie and Zoe want to choose the most promising horse for a riding competition, they'll need science know-how and a lesson in horse anatomy.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Hanna, Izzie and their crew learn that wind is a powerful, renewable energy source when they run turbine experiments and design a mini-wind farm.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Fashion really shines for Hallie and her pals when "Project Runway" designer Diana Eng uses electronic technology to make a dress light up.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Chemistry is knowledge Claire can count on when she and her friends learn to make their favorite comfort foods healthier -- and just as tasty.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Elle and Meg slip into scuba gear and go diving off the reefs of Catalina, the perfect place to learn about marine ecology and biodiversity.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Abby and her science pals put computer programming and psychology knowledge to good use researching how disaster victims respond to rescue robots.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Reuse, recycle and reclaim! Izzie and Mackenzie team up to tackle a school trash problem and invent a new use for used yogurt cups.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: The sky's no limit for Avianna and Miranda when they use telescopes and GPS technology to combat light pollution and reveal night's twinkling stars.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: The SciGirls head to the U.S. Naval Academy, where they build an underwater robot to investigate artificial oyster reefs in Chesapeake Bay.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Inspired by Mother Nature's designs for animal feet and flippers, the girls set out to make a safer shoe for navigating icy winter streets.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: The SciGirls examine the impact the non-native Canary Island palm has on San Diego habitats, comparing the palms to native species.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: San Francisco SciGirls design a smartphone application to present the history and geoscience of the 1989 Loma Prieta earthquake.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: The girls design an experiment to test whether kids can multitask -- juggling a number of different media forms -- effectively.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: The SciGirls test different types of insulation to determine which one best warms an ice shanty on a frozen Minnesota lake.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: As they design an experiment to compare four types of activities for difficulty and likability, the girls learn about the importance of exercise.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Using math, mapping and data visualization, Phoenix SciGirls learn how to establish a healthy honeybee colony in their urban environment.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: The girls break out some serious tools to build a bike-powered ice cream maker and get a lesson in the engineering design process.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: It's "SciGirls" meets "CSI" when the kids team up with forensic scientists and examine evidence to solve a mysterious crime.
episodes.title: Episode 10
